entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
